paper.abstract: Non-standard applications like CAD/CAM, image processing and AI require database systems with facilities to handle sophisticated semantics. Advanced data models supporting complexly structured objects, abstract data types and the like have been developed to this end. However, any data model remains necessarily restricted to rather static and global semantics, not taking into account individual and dynamically changing issues. It is therefore necessary to formulate additional semantic rules, which may be rather complex and pose a variety of checking as well as enforcement requirements.
